description: Canonical answers for repetitive application questions across Greenhouse, Lever, and Workday.

fields.question: Are you legally authorized to work in the United States?
fields.notes: Match company eligibility requirements; align with immigration counsel guidance.

fields.question: Will you now or in the future require visa sponsorship?
Preferred name
fields.notes: Keep in sync with resume header and email signature.

fields.question: Pronouns
fields.notes: Optional; remove if company does not request.

fields.question: Are you willing to relocate?
fields.notes: If conditional, mention hub preferences in additional info.

fields.question: What is your remote work preference?
fields.notes: Match JD expectation; provide detail in additional context when hybrid.

fields.question: What are your salary expectations?
fields.notes: Quote base salary range; include OTE context when role is sales/GT.

fields.question: When can you start?
fields.notes: If notice period applies, specify number of weeks.

fields.question: If employed, what is your notice period?
Were you referred by someone at the company?
fields.notes: Ensure referral contact has agreed to be listed.

fields.question: Equal Employment Opportunity voluntary survey
fields.notes: Optional; populate only when candidate approves disclosure.

fields.question: Self-identification / diversity survey
fields.notes: Optional; align with candidate consent policies.

fields.question: Voluntary self-identification of disability
fields.notes: Use government-provided language if company supplies form.

fields.question: Portfolio or additional links
fields.notes: Include only maintained destinations; remove placeholders when empty.

fields.question: Anything else you'd like us to know?
fields.notes: Use to reinforce role-specific proof or clarify work preferences.
